author: m.kalinin
content: It doesn't seem that anything has changed from our latest conversations on that topic. All EL clients do not support multiple concurrent build processes, some of them may not have a state for a non-canonical competing branch to be capable of building on top of it. Thus, the requirement to run build process only on top of the head and unification of `preparePayload` and `forkchoiceUpdated` methods
